repositories.contributors: - [Patrick Ferris](https://github.com/patricoferris) identified and opened PRs to address js_of_ocaml patch regressions ([#20](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/20)) and iarray compatibility issues ([#19](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/19)), investigating root causes related to dependency versioning and patch application

group_summaries.brief_summary: Package ecosystem activity with Rocq releases, Sail 0.20, ppxlib 0.37.0, and mobile UI improvements for ocaml.org
group_summaries.new_features_summary: Rocq 9.x releases, Sail Rocq semantics, ppxlib 0.37.0, mobile package page fixes, security updates, editor tooling
group_summaries.new_features:
- **OCaml 5.4 reference manual** update with improved native debugger documentation by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722))
- **Sail 0.20** released with Rocq semantics implementation - core stepwise semantics now in Rocq, improved C++ backend support across 13 packages by [Alasdair Armstrong](https://github.com/Alasdair) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713))
- **Rocq 9.1.0 and 9.0.1** releases by [Guillaume Melquiond](https://github.com/silene) bringing latest Coq fork updates ([ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28707](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28707))
- **ppxlib 0.37.0** released with ppxlib-tools by [Nathan Rebours](https://github.com/NathanReb) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28686](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28686)), including compatibility fix for ppx_yojson ([ocaml/opam-repository#28717](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28717))
- **lambdapi 3.0.0** released with new tactics (simplify, orelse, repeat, eval), string literal builtins, and websearch options by [Frédéric Blanqui](https://github.com/fblanqui) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28178](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28178))
- **miou 0.5.0** performance improvement - now uses poll(2)/ppoll(2) instead of select(3P) for better concurrency by [Calascibetta Romain](https://github.com/dinosaure) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28714](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28714))
- **domain-name 0.5.0** bug fix disallowing trailing hyphen (-) in host labels per RFC requirements by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28709](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28709))
- **ca-certs-nss 3.117** security update with latest Mozilla NSS X.509 trust anchors from 2025-10-03 by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28712](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28712))
- **coq-lsp 0.2.4+9.1** released by [Emilio Jesús Gallego Arias](https://github.com/ejgallego) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28534](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28534))
- **Mobile package page layout** improved by moving table of contents from right sidebar to mobile-friendly location, fixing space consumption issue on small screens by [Seth Rider](https://github.com/psethwick) ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3369](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3369))
- **ocaml.nvim Neovim plugin** announced providing advanced LSP features like typed holes navigation and semantic code movement ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3372](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3372))
group_summaries.group_overview:
- **Package ecosystem growth** with 20 merged package updates in [ocaml/opam-repository](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository) including releases for Rocq 9.x, Sail 0.20, ppxlib 0.37.0, and lambdapi 3.0.0 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713), [ocaml/opam-repository#28686](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28686), [ocaml/opam-repository#28178](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28178))
- **Website improvements** for [ocaml/ocaml.org](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org) with mobile UI fixes for package documentation pages and editor tooling announcements ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3369](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3369), [ocaml/ocaml.org#3372](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3372))
- **OCaml 5.4 preparation** beginning with preview packages, reference manual documentation improvements, and ocamlformat support work ([ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722), [ocaml/opam-repository#28716](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28716))
- **Security updates** with ca-certs-nss 3.117 and base package checksum verification improvements ([ocaml/opam-repository#28712](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28712), [ocaml/opam-repository#28718](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28718))
- **Community content** additions including Gospel ecosystem status update and ocaml.nvim plugin announcement on backstage blog ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3352](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3352), [ocaml/ocaml.org#3372](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3372))
- **26 contributors** actively participated across both repositories with package releases, UI improvements, and content additions
group_summaries.activity_summary: New packages proposed (Catala, otp, Fmlib), Dune package management migration ongoing, blog content published
group_summaries.activity:

- **Package maintenance updates** merged including [David Sancho](https://github.com/davesnx) releasing html_of_jsx 0.0.6 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28711](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28711)), [Oliver Friedmann](https://github.com/oliverfriedmann) releasing mlsolver 1.5 and fadecider 0.7 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28701](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28701), [ocaml/opam-repository#28702](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28702)), [Stephen Sherratt](https://github.com/gridbugs) releasing climate 0.8.5 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28708](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28708)), [Anton Yabchinskiy](https://github.com/a12n) releasing pcrc 0.25.2 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28699](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28699)), [Jason D. Nielsen](https://github.com/drjdn) releasing p5scm 0.5.0 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28700](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28700)), and [Calascibetta Romain](https://github.com/dinosaure) releasing spoke 0.0.4 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28640](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28640))

- **Gospel ecosystem blog post** published by [@sabine](https://github.com/sabine) describing ready-to-use testing tools and evolving proof capabilities ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3352](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3352))

group_summaries.cross_repository_work:

- **OCaml 5.4 preparation** coordination between reference manual updates in [ocaml/opam-repository](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository) ([ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722)) and upcoming documentation needs for [ocaml/ocaml.org](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org)
group_summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Rocq ecosystem expansion** with releases of 9.0.1 and 9.1.0 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28707](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28707)), related packages like coq-lsp ([ocaml/opam-repository#28534](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28534)), and Sail integrating Rocq semantics ([ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713)) showing growing adoption of the Coq fork
- **OCaml 5.4 preparation** beginning with preview packages, documentation updates including reference manual improvements ([ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722)), and compatibility work ([ocaml/opam-repository#28716](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28716), [ocaml/opam-repository#28719](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28719), [ocaml/opam-repository#28733](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28733))
- **Large coordinated releases** such as Sail's 13-package update ([ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713)) demonstrating ecosystem maturation and better coordination of multi-package projects
- **Security infrastructure maintenance** with regular updates to ca-certs-nss following Mozilla certificate releases ([ocaml/opam-repository#28712](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28712)) and checksum verification improvements ([ocaml/opam-repository#28718](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28718))
- **Domain-specific languages** reaching production readiness with Catala 1.0.0~beta for tax code ([ocaml/opam-repository#28723](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28723)) and Sail for processor instruction semantics ([ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713))
- **Mobile-first design** refinements addressing usability issues on package documentation pages with responsive layout adjustments ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3369](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3369))
- **Editor tooling expansion** through new plugin releases targeting different editor ecosystems with Neovim support ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3372](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3372)) following earlier Emacs support
- **Formal verification accessibility** highlighted through Gospel ecosystem maturation ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3352](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3352)), emphasizing practical testing tools available today while proof capabilities develop

group_summaries.brief_summary: OxCaml parametric libraries gaining tooling support, opam 2.5.0~alpha1 released, and package management features maturing
group_summaries.new_features_summary: Package search in Dune, concurrent tests with watch mode, Merlin completion fixes, multi-file odoc generation, opam 2.5.0~alpha1
group_summaries.new_features:
- **Package search command** in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) via `dune pkg search` for finding packages by name using substring or glob patterns ([ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547))
- **Concurrent test execution** with watch mode in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) allowing `dune runtest` while watch server is active ([ocaml/dune#12473](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12473), [ocaml/dune#8114](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/8114))
- **Completion for inlined record labels** in [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin) fixing pattern matching against constructors with inline record syntax ([ocaml/merlin#1978](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/issues/1978))
- **Multi-file support** in [ocaml/odoc](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc) for `markdown-generate` and `html-generate` commands accepting multiple `.odocl` files ([ocaml/odoc#1388](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1388))
- **Shell initialization improvements** in [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) including writing to `.bashrc` instead of `.profile` for Bash users ([ocaml/opam#6603](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6603))
- **AppArmor support** in [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) install script resolving issues on Ubuntu 24.04 ([ocaml/opam#6647](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6647), fixes [ocaml/opam#5968](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/5968))
- **Consistent NaN handling** in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) across JavaScript engines by converting signaling NaNs to quiet NaNs ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2110](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2110))
group_summaries.group_overview:
- [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) led activity with package management features, OxCaml parametric library support, extensive stanza refactoring, and concurrent test execution ([ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547), [ocaml/dune#12473](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12473), [ocaml/dune#12550](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12550))
- [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) released version 2.5.0~alpha1 with shell initialization improvements, platform-specific fixes, and testing infrastructure enhancements ([ocaml/opam#6744](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6744))
- [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin) fixed completion for inlined record labels and updated CI for OCaml 5.4 support ([ocaml/merlin#1978](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/issues/1978))
- [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) delivered runtime bug fixes, WebAssembly backend cleanup, and ongoing OCaml 5.4 compatibility work ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2110](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2110), [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2107](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2107))
- [ocaml/odoc](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc) enhanced markdown generator with multi-file support and improved CLI organization ([ocaml/odoc#1388](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1388))
- [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) saw new PRs for labelled argument autocompletion and metrics precision improvements ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564), [ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1565](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1565))
- [ocaml/ocamlfind](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind) received Windows build fixes for OCaml 5.0+ on Cygwin and MSYS2 ([ocaml/ocamlfind#112](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/pull/112))
group_summaries.activity_summary: Internal refactoring in Dune, odoc-Dune integration work, LSP completion intelligence improvements, and js_of_ocaml runtime enhancements
group_summaries.activity:
- **Dune internal refactoring** by [Rudi Grinberg](https://github.com/rgrinberg) with extensive stanza definition cleanup removing boilerplate and duplicate code ([ocaml/dune#12593](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12593), [ocaml/dune#12592](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12592), [ocaml/dune#12594](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12594), [ocaml/dune#12595](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12595))
- **Package management autolocking** ongoing work by [Marek Kubica](https://github.com/Leonidas-from-XIV) making lock files build targets in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) ([ocaml/dune#11775](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/11775))
- **Melange improvements** by [Antonio Nuno Monteiro](https://github.com/anmonteiro) fixing `.cmj` dependency tracking with `include_qualified` in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) ([ocaml/dune#12531](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12531))
- **LSP completion intelligence** work by [Tom Ekander](https://github.com/lessp) adding labelled argument autocompletion with `:` trigger character in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564))
- **Metrics precision improvement** by [Tim ats](https://github.com/Tim-ats-d) switching to `Unix.gettimeofday` for sub-second timestamps in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1565](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1565))
- **MLX file formatting** support by [David Sancho](https://github.com/davesnx) integrating ocamlformat-mlx for `.mlx` files in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1528](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1528))
- **WebAssembly eval function** PR opened by [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) for JavaScript eval access in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2108](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2108))
- **OCaml 5.4 CI testing** ongoing by [@hhugo](https://github.com/hhugo) in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml), blocked on wasm_of_ocaml compatibility ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2103](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2103))
- **Opam post-release work** including version bumps and installer updates following 2.5.0~alpha1 release in [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) ([ocaml/opam#6747](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6747), [ocaml/opam#6749](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6749))
group_summaries.cross_repository_work:
- **OxCaml parametric libraries tooling support** coordinated across [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune), [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin), [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp), and [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) including Merlin config generation ([ocaml/dune#12550](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12550)), library instantiation ([ocaml/dune#12561](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12561)), Nix devShell setup ([ocaml/dune#12582](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12582)), and tracking issue for comprehensive tooling integration ([ocaml/dune#12536](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12536))
- **Odoc-Dune integration** with multi-file support in [ocaml/odoc](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc) driven by markdown integration needs in [ocaml/dune#12477](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12477) ([ocaml/odoc#1388](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1388))
- **OCaml 5.4 release adoption** with CI updates in [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin) ([ocaml/merlin commit 307ee45a](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/commit/307ee45afe20f07d18ac3d4b143d7dc507b54977)) and ongoing testing in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2103](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2103))
- **Windows platform support** improvements in [ocaml/ocamlfind](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind) addressing OCaml 5.0+ compatibility ([ocaml/ocamlfind#112](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/pull/112)) and [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) with bootstrap dependency updates ([ocaml/opam#6592](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6592)), both referencing shared issues like [ocaml/opam#6732](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6732)
- **Package management ecosystem** development spanning [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) with `dune pkg search` ([ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547)) and lock directory validation ([ocaml/dune#12549](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12549)), and [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) with 2.5.0~alpha1 release ([ocaml/opam#6744](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6744))
group_summaries.notable_discussions:
- **Labelled argument autocompletion design** extensive discussion in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) with [Ulysse](https://github.com/voodoos) raising concerns about `:` trigger character scope, [Tom Ekander](https://github.com/lessp) demonstrating usefulness in large codebases, and proposals for configurable construct query behavior ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564))
- **Package lock directory placement** ongoing debate in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) about whether lock directories should default to `_build` versus worktree, balancing portability against repository noise ([ocaml/dune#12097](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12097))
- **WebAssembly eval function behavior** discussion in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) between [@hhugo](https://github.com/hhugo) and [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) about ensuring runtime consistency between Wasm and JS backends ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2108](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2108))
- **Admin script cleanup** discussion in [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) between [Kate](https://github.com/kit-ty-kate) and [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) regarding removal of unused scripts and fate of `opam-admin.top` ([ocaml/opam#6750](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6750))
- **Stdout vs stderr output** discussion in [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune) about improving shell pipeline compatibility for informational commands ([ocaml/dune#12586](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12586))
group_summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Parametric libraries ecosystem maturation** with coordinated tooling support across build system ([ocaml/dune#12550](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12550)), IDE ([ocaml/merlin#1978](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/issues/1978)), LSP ([ocaml/dune#12536](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12536)), and compilation targets ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml)), representing investment in OxCaml feature completeness
- **Package management feature convergence** between Dune and opam with search capabilities ([ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547)), lock file improvements ([ocaml/dune#12549](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12549)), and autolocking work ([ocaml/dune#11775](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/11775)) moving toward production-ready package management in Dune
- **Editor experience refinement** focus across tools with completion improvements in [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin) ([ocaml/merlin#1978](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/issues/1978)) and [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp) ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564)), metrics precision ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1565](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1565)), and MLX formatting support ([ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1528](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1528))
- **Platform-specific hardening** emphasis with Windows fixes in [ocaml/ocamlfind](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind) ([ocaml/ocamlfind#112](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/pull/112)) and [ocaml/opam](https://github.com/ocaml/opam) ([ocaml/opam#6592](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6592)), AppArmor support ([ocaml/opam#6647](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6647)), and Alpine Linux hardening ([ocaml/opam#6742](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6742))
- **WebAssembly backend investment** continuing in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) with runtime cleanup ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2109](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2109)), eval function support ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2108](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2108)), and WASI runtime development ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#1831](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/1831))
- **OCaml compiler evolution tracking** shown through 5.4 adoption in [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin) and [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml), compiler-libs integration ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2111](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2111)), and consuming compiler hints ([ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#1721](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/1721))

group_summaries.brief_summary: Metaprogramming advances, Merlin integration of quotation infrastructure, and js_of_ocaml patch maintenance
group_summaries.new_features_summary: Quotation APIs, layout polymorphism in Merlin, bits8/bits16 kinds, and debugger improvements
group_summaries.new_features:
- New **quotation API functions** `Code.Closed.to_exp` and `Code.Closed.print` added to `CamlinternalQuote` module for converting closed code to expressions and formatted printing in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896)
- **Quotation and metaprogramming support** integrated into Merlin via new CamlinternalQuote module (2,805 lines) providing infrastructure for compile-time code generation with variable binding, staging, and AST manipulation facilities in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **Layout polymorphism language extension** (`Layout_poly`) with maturity levels (alpha, beta, stable) allowing types to be polymorphic over memory representations in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **New jkind primitives** including `immediate64_or_null` for nullable immediate64 values and `kind_of_idx` for block indices with mode crossing support in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **Stage tracking in environment** with new `stage` type and operations `enter_quotation`, `enter_splice`, and `check_no_open_quotations` for managing multi-stage compilation contexts in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **bits8 and bits16 kinds** now allowed without requiring the `small_numbers` extension in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898), improving library integration while maintaining upstream compatibility
- Improved **location information in pattern matching** for better debugger stepping behavior and source code position reporting in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884)
- Enhanced **debugger register handling** in `Name_for_debugger` operations with proper register substitution and unknown location handling in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4880](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4880)
- **Shrink-wrapping testing** now enabled in CI through new option to `regalloc.exe` tool for inserting prologues in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4892](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4892)
- Fixed **over-expunged toplevel** by removing unboxed types (`Float_u`, `Iarray`, `Int32_u`, `Int64_u`, `Nativeint_u`) not in compatible Stdlib in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877)
- Fixed **loading paths from paths file** bug in `load_path.ml` where variable shadowing caused incorrect path resolution for `-I-paths` flag in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4878](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4878)
- **New compiler warning 215** (`Implied_attribute`) detecting when attributes are redundant because they're implied by other attributes in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
group_summaries.activity_summary: 10 new PRs in oxcaml/oxcaml on modes, effects, and CFG optimizations; Merlin merged OxCaml 5.2.0minus-22
group_summaries.activity:
- **Metaprogramming infrastructure** advanced in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) with quotation evaluation fixes by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) addressing exception handling and primitive addresses in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896), double-linking prevention for eval support files by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895), and ongoing work on Camlinternaleval dependencies in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899) and [oxcaml/oxcaml#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900)
- **Flambda2 optimization work** delivered n-way join analysis exposure by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821), datalog Virtual_machine.iterator cleanup in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4897](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4897), and reverted static constant sharing in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893) due to backtrace issues
- **Backend and type system** improvements included CFG terminator simplification revert due to loop information issues by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4885](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4885), private `Reg.t` refactoring in progress by [Greta Yorsh](https://github.com/gretay-js) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4888](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4888), and path loading fix by [Andrei Odintsov](https://github.com/Forestryks) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4878](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4878)
- **Modes system refinement** with 10 new PRs opened including continuation handling improvements by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), global/aliased implications by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), mode variable conversion in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792), exception crossing improvements in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891), and external array renaming in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4890](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4890)
- **Effects system development** progressing with continuation handling refactoring in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), preemption support work by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881), and domain lock unification by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)
- **Infrastructure and tooling** updates included GDB memsearch utility improvements by [Nick Barnes](https://github.com/NickBarnes) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4886](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4886), const qualifiers for caml_startup functions in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4882](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4882), cfg_tool.exe development in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4596](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4596), and toplevel expunging fix by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877)
- **Additional work** includes Unix local/read annotations by [Vesa Karvonen](https://github.com/polytypic) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4830](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4830), CFG value propagation for floats by [Xavier Clerc](https://github.com/xclerc) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4879](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4879), extended CFG terminator simplification in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4807](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4807), and documentation typo fixes by [@tkoukpari](https://github.com/tkoukpari) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4883](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4883)
group_summaries.cross_repository_work:
- **Merlin integration** of OxCaml compiler features with [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) merging OxCaml 5.2.0minus-22 in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191), bringing quotation support and layout polymorphism from [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) into Merlin editor tooling with 168 files changed (32,413 insertions, 24,515 deletions)
- **js_of_ocaml patch management** in [oxcaml/opam-repository](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository) with [Patrick Ferris](https://github.com/patricoferris) addressing patch regressions in [oxcaml/opam-repository#20](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/20) and iarray compatibility issues in [oxcaml/opam-repository#19](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/19), investigating coordination with [oxcaml/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/js_of_ocaml) dependency versions
- **Repository branding transition** with Merlin import script updated to target [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) instead of ocaml-flambda/flambda-backend in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191), reflecting project evolution
- **Upstream synchronization** with Merlin tracking OxCaml revision 05b98d54a75966bf39540157c8bd1f7281a39e57 from [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **Metaprogramming maturity** progressing across repositories with quotation APIs in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896) supporting the 2,805-line CamlinternalQuote module now available in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
group_summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Metaprogramming as core feature** with investment in quotation infrastructure across [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900), and integration into Merlin via [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **Mode-aware type system evolution** with multiple PRs refining uniqueness, locality, and sharing constraints in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4792](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4792), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891), and global/aliased relationship work
- **Backend optimization caution** demonstrated by reverts in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893) and [oxcaml/oxcaml#4885](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4885) when optimizations cause backtrace or loop analysis issues, prioritizing correctness
- **Effects system maturation** with continuation handling in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), preemption support in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881), and domain lock unification in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)
- **Language extensibility** through maturity-tracked extensions (alpha/beta/stable levels) enabling gradual rollout of experimental features like layout polymorphism in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- **Upstream compatibility focus** with work allowing erasable features like bits8/bits16 kinds without extensions in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898) and toplevel fixes in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4877](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4877)
- **Patch stability challenges** in js_of_ocaml integration with recurring issues where resolved patches reappear in [oxcaml/opam-repository#20](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/20) and [oxcaml/opam-repository#19](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/19)
- **AI-assisted development workflow** with explicit acknowledgment of Claude for automated conflict resolution and compilation fixes in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)

group_summaries.brief_summary: BLAKE128 hash migration merged, thread safety improvements, and ongoing tuple projections RFC discussion
group_summaries.new_features_summary: BLAKE128 hash migration, C thread domain registration API, TSan fixes, and FlexDLL build improvements
group_summaries.new_features:
- **BLAKE128 hash migration** for compiler CRCs replacing MD5 across all file formats (cmi, cmo, cmx, cmxs) and consistency checking by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#13913](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13913))
- **New C API function** `caml_c_thread_register_in_domain` for registering C threads in specific OCaml domains by [Jack Joergensen](https://github.com/jacknojo) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14275](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14275))
- **TSan fixes** for C calls with many stack arguments affecting ARM64, POWER, RISC-V, s390x, and x86_64 architectures by [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14255](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14255))
- **FlexDLL build improvements** with new configuration options for MANIFEST_TOOL, RC (resource compiler), and FLEXLINKFLAGS, requiring FlexDLL >= 0.44 by [Antonin Décimo](https://github.com/MisterDA) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14034](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14034))
- **Type checker determinism** improvements avoiding hash table iteration for types and terms by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14297](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14297), [ocaml/ocaml#14299](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14299))
- **Manual updates** including new native debugger chapter covering GDB and LLDB support by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#13747](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13747))
- **Runtime_events.Timestamp documentation** improvements clarifying timestamp precision and behavior by [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14293](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14293))
- **Symbol naming changes** using `$` instead of `.` to separate module from identifiers in symbols by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#13050](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13050))
group_summaries.group_overview:
- **[ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml)** merged twelve PRs including the BLAKE128 hash migration ([ocaml/ocaml#13913](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13913)), thread safety improvements ([ocaml/ocaml#14255](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14255), [ocaml/ocaml#14275](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14275)), and FlexDLL build enhancements ([ocaml/ocaml#14034](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14034))
- **[ocaml/RFCs](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs)** continued discussion on tuple projections RFC ([ocaml/RFCs#57](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs/pull/57)) with focus on row-polymorphic tuples approach
- **New PRs** include [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) proposing to make Hashtbl seeded by default ([ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291)) and [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) addressing runtime memory safety in multiple areas ([ocaml/ocaml#14303](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14303), [ocaml/ocaml#14304](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14304), [ocaml/ocaml#14305](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14305), [ocaml/ocaml#14306](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14306))
- **Runtime improvements** focused on thread safety with TSan fixes and new C API for domain-specific thread registration ([ocaml/ocaml#14275](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14275))
group_summaries.activity_summary: Twelve merged PRs and twelve newly opened PRs in ocaml/ocaml, plus ongoing RFC discussion in ocaml/RFCs
group_summaries.activity:
- **Twelve new PRs opened** in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) including [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) proposing to make Hashtbl seeded by default ([ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291)), deprecate Digest top-level bindings ([ocaml/ocaml#14294](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14294)), and preserve option R in runtime parameters ([ocaml/ocaml#14292](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14292))
- **Runtime memory safety improvements** by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) addressing race conditions in minor GC ([ocaml/ocaml#14306](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14306)), memprof configuration ([ocaml/ocaml#14304](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14304), [ocaml/ocaml#14305](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14305)), and backup thread synchronization ([ocaml/ocaml#14303](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14303))
- **Thread sanitizer improvements** by [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) fixing POWER shadow stack accounting ([ocaml/ocaml#14302](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14302)), disabling flaky TSan test ([ocaml/ocaml#14301](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14301)), and improving pipe operator typechecking ([ocaml/ocaml#14286](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14286))
- **Build and tooling improvements** including [Antonin Décimo](https://github.com/MisterDA) improving mingw format specifiers ([ocaml/ocaml#14308](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14308)) and [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) fixing frame pointer tests ([ocaml/ocaml#14295](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14295))
- **Documentation updates** with [Guillaume Munch-Maccagnoni](https://github.com/gadmm) clarifying thread registration constraints ([ocaml/ocaml#14296](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14296)) and [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) fixing CI typo ([ocaml/ocaml#14309](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14309))
- **Tuple projections RFC** discussion continued in [ocaml/RFCs](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs) with [Alistair](https://github.com/johnyob) and [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) debating the scope of row-polymorphic tuples ([ocaml/RFCs#57](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs/pull/57))
group_summaries.notable_discussions:
- **One-liner comment syntax** proposal by [David Wong](https://github.com/mimoo) exploring the addition of single-line comment syntax to OCaml in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#12066](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/12066))
- **Row-polymorphic tuples** debate in [ocaml/RFCs](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs) with [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) suggesting separation into a separate RFC and [Alistair](https://github.com/johnyob) clarifying that the current tuple projections RFC only discusses them as a future compatibility consideration ([ocaml/RFCs#57](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs/pull/57))
- **Hashtbl seeded by default** proposal by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) to improve security and prevent DoS attacks in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) ([ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291))
group_summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Runtime memory safety focus** with multiple PRs from [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) addressing race conditions and memory management in runtime components including minor GC ([ocaml/ocaml#14306](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14306)), memprof ([ocaml/ocaml#14304](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14304), [ocaml/ocaml#14305](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14305)), and domain termination ([ocaml/ocaml#14303](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14303))
- **Thread sanitizer testing** becoming more comprehensive with [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) fixing bugs across multiple architectures ([ocaml/ocaml#14255](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14255), [ocaml/ocaml#14302](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14302)) and improving test coverage ([ocaml/ocaml#14301](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14301))
- **Cryptographic hash migration** from MD5 to BLAKE128 reflecting modern security practices and performance considerations ([ocaml/ocaml#13913](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13913))
- **Build toolchain flexibility** improvements for Windows/FlexDLL enabling better compiler selection and cross-platform support ([ocaml/ocaml#14034](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14034), [ocaml/ocaml#14308](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14308))
- **Compiler determinism** as a continued focus with hash table iteration being eliminated from type and term generation ([ocaml/ocaml#14297](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14297), [ocaml/ocaml#14299](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14299))

weekly_summary.brief_summary: BLAKE128 hash migration and runtime safety focus in core, metaprogramming advances in OxCaml, and package management maturation in tools
weekly_summary.new_features_summary: BLAKE128 hash migration, C thread domain API, quotation infrastructure, ppxlib 0.37.0, Dune package search, opam 2.5.0~alpha1
weekly_summary.new_features:
- __RUMINANT:core__ **BLAKE128 hash migration** for compiler CRCs replacing MD5 across all file formats (cmi, cmo, cmx, cmxs) and consistency checking by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) in [ocaml/ocaml#13913](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13913)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **New C API function** `caml_c_thread_register_in_domain` for registering C threads in specific OCaml domains by [Jack Joergensen](https://github.com/jacknojo) in [ocaml/ocaml#14275](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14275)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **TSan fixes** for C calls with many stack arguments affecting ARM64, POWER, RISC-V, s390x, and x86_64 architectures by [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) in [ocaml/ocaml#14255](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14255)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **FlexDLL build improvements** with new configuration options for MANIFEST_TOOL, RC (resource compiler), and FLEXLINKFLAGS, requiring FlexDLL >= 0.44 by [Antonin Décimo](https://github.com/MisterDA) in [ocaml/ocaml#14034](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14034)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Type checker determinism** improvements avoiding hash table iteration for types and terms by [Vincent Laviron](https://github.com/lthls) in [ocaml/ocaml#14297](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14297), [ocaml/ocaml#14299](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14299)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Symbol naming changes** using `$` instead of `.` to separate module from identifiers in symbols by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) in [ocaml/ocaml#13050](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13050)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Quotation API functions** `Code.Closed.to_exp` and `Code.Closed.print` added to `CamlinternalQuote` module for converting closed code to expressions and formatted printing in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Quotation and metaprogramming support** integrated into Merlin via new CamlinternalQuote module (2,805 lines) providing infrastructure for compile-time code generation with variable binding, staging, and AST manipulation in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Layout polymorphism language extension** (`Layout_poly`) with maturity levels (alpha, beta, stable) allowing types to be polymorphic over memory representations in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **New jkind primitives** including `immediate64_or_null` for nullable immediate64 values and `kind_of_idx` for block indices with mode crossing support in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **bits8 and bits16 kinds** now allowed without requiring the `small_numbers` extension in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4898](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4898)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Location information in pattern matching** improved for better debugger stepping behavior and source code position reporting in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4884](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4884)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Package search command** in Dune via `dune pkg search` for finding packages by name using substring or glob patterns in [ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Concurrent test execution** with watch mode in Dune allowing `dune runtest` while watch server is active in [ocaml/dune#12473](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12473), [ocaml/dune#8114](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/8114)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Completion for inlined record labels** in Merlin fixing pattern matching against constructors with inline record syntax in [ocaml/merlin#1978](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin/issues/1978)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Multi-file support** in odoc for `markdown-generate` and `html-generate` commands accepting multiple `.odocl` files in [ocaml/odoc#1388](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1388)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Shell initialization improvements** in opam including writing to `.bashrc` instead of `.profile` for Bash users in [ocaml/opam#6603](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6603)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **opam 2.5.0~alpha1** released with AppArmor support resolving issues on Ubuntu 24.04 in [ocaml/opam#6647](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6647), [ocaml/opam#6744](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6744)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Consistent NaN handling** in js_of_ocaml across JavaScript engines by converting signaling NaNs to quiet NaNs in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2110](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2110)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Sail 0.20** released with Rocq semantics implementation - core stepwise semantics now in Rocq, improved C++ backend support across 13 packages by [Alasdair Armstrong](https://github.com/Alasdair) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Rocq 9.1.0 and 9.0.1** releases by [Guillaume Melquiond](https://github.com/silene) bringing latest Coq fork updates in [ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28707](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28707)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **ppxlib 0.37.0** released with ppxlib-tools by [Nathan Rebours](https://github.com/NathanReb) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28686](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28686)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **lambdapi 3.0.0** released with new tactics (simplify, orelse, repeat, eval), string literal builtins, and websearch options by [Frédéric Blanqui](https://github.com/fblanqui) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28178](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28178)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **miou 0.5.0** performance improvement - now uses poll(2)/ppoll(2) instead of select(3P) for better concurrency by [Calascibetta Romain](https://github.com/dinosaure) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28714](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28714)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **domain-name 0.5.0** bug fix disallowing trailing hyphen (-) in host labels per RFC requirements by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28709](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28709)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **ca-certs-nss 3.117** security update with latest Mozilla NSS X.509 trust anchors from 2025-10-03 by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28712](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28712)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Mobile package page layout** improved by moving table of contents from right sidebar to mobile-friendly location by [Seth Rider](https://github.com/psethwick) in [ocaml/ocaml.org#3369](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3369)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Manual updates** including new native debugger chapter covering GDB and LLDB support by [Tim McGilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) in [ocaml/ocaml#13747](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13747)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Runtime_events.Timestamp documentation** improvements clarifying timestamp precision and behavior by [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) in [ocaml/ocaml#14293](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14293)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **OCaml 5.4 reference manual** update with improved native debugger documentation by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) in [ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722)

weekly_summary.group_overview:
- __RUMINANT:core__ The **core compiler** merged 12 PRs including the long-awaited BLAKE128 hash migration ([ocaml/ocaml#13913](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13913)), thread safety improvements ([ocaml/ocaml#14255](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14255), [ocaml/ocaml#14275](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14275)), and FlexDLL build enhancements ([ocaml/ocaml#14034](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14034)), while opening 12 new PRs focused on runtime memory safety by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) and **Hashtbl seeding by default** proposal by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) ([ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291))
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ The **OxCaml project** delivered metaprogramming advances with quotation infrastructure in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896) and integrated this 2,805-line CamlinternalQuote module into Merlin ([oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191)), while progressing the **modes system** with 10 new PRs on continuation handling, global/aliased implications, and exception crossing, alongside **Flambda2 optimization** work and ongoing **effects system** development
- __RUMINANT:tools__ The **tooling ecosystem** saw package management features mature with Dune's package search command ([ocaml/dune#12547](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12547)) and concurrent test execution ([ocaml/dune#12473](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12473)), opam 2.5.0~alpha1 release ([ocaml/opam#6744](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6744)), and **OxCaml parametric libraries** gaining coordinated tooling support across Dune, Merlin, and LSP ([ocaml/dune#12550](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12550), [ocaml/dune#12536](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12536))
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ The **package ecosystem** grew with 20 merged package updates including Rocq 9.x releases ([ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28707](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28707)), Sail 0.20 with Rocq semantics ([ocaml/opam-repository#28713](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28713)), ppxlib 0.37.0 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28686](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28686)), and security updates like ca-certs-nss 3.117 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28712](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28712)), while **OCaml.org** received mobile UI improvements ([ocaml/ocaml.org#3369](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3369)) and **OCaml 5.4 preparation** began across repositories
- __RUMINANT:multicore__ The **multicore group** had no activity this week

weekly_summary.activity_summary: Runtime memory safety improvements, metaprogramming infrastructure refinement, Dune internal refactoring, and new packages proposed
weekly_summary.activity:
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Twelve new PRs opened** in [ocaml/ocaml](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml) with [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) proposing to make Hashtbl seeded by default ([ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291)), deprecate Digest top-level bindings ([ocaml/ocaml#14294](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14294)), and preserve option R in runtime parameters ([ocaml/ocaml#14292](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14292))
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Runtime memory safety improvements** by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) addressing race conditions in minor GC ([ocaml/ocaml#14306](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14306)), memprof configuration ([ocaml/ocaml#14304](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14304), [ocaml/ocaml#14305](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14305)), and backup thread synchronization ([ocaml/ocaml#14303](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14303))
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Thread sanitizer improvements** by [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) fixing POWER shadow stack accounting ([ocaml/ocaml#14302](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14302)), disabling flaky TSan test ([ocaml/ocaml#14301](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14301)), and improving pipe operator typechecking ([ocaml/ocaml#14286](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14286))
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Metaprogramming infrastructure** advanced with quotation evaluation fixes by [Jack Rickard](https://github.com/Skepfyr) addressing exception handling and primitive addresses in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4896](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4896), double-linking prevention for eval support files by [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4895](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4895), and ongoing work on Camlinternaleval dependencies in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4899](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4899), [oxcaml/oxcaml#4900](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4900)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Flambda2 optimization work** delivered n-way join analysis exposure by [Basile Clément](https://github.com/bclement-ocp) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4821](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4821), datalog Virtual_machine.iterator cleanup in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4897](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4897), and reverted static constant sharing in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4893](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4893) due to backtrace issues
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Modes system refinement** with 10 new PRs including continuation handling improvements by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), global/aliased implications by [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4889](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4889), and exception crossing improvements in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4891](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4891)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Effects system development** progressing with continuation handling refactoring in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4901](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4901), preemption support work by [Aspen Smith](https://github.com/glittershark) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4881](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4881), and domain lock unification by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan) in [oxcaml/oxcaml#4769](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4769)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Dune internal refactoring** by [Rudi Grinberg](https://github.com/rgrinberg) with extensive stanza definition cleanup removing boilerplate and duplicate code in [ocaml/dune#12593](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12593), [ocaml/dune#12592](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12592), [ocaml/dune#12594](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12594), [ocaml/dune#12595](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12595)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Package management autolocking** ongoing work by [Marek Kubica](https://github.com/Leonidas-from-XIV) making lock files build targets in [ocaml/dune#11775](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/11775)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **LSP completion intelligence** work by [Tom Ekander](https://github.com/lessp) adding labelled argument autocompletion with `:` trigger character in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **WebAssembly eval function** PR opened by [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) for JavaScript eval access in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2108](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2108)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Catala 1.0.0~beta** proposed by [Denis Merigoux](https://github.com/denismerigoux) - domain-specific language for tax code specification with literate programming for legislative texts in [ocaml/opam-repository#28723](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28723)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **otp 0.2** package proposed by [A.G.](https://github.com/Heyji2) - RFC6238 time-based One Time Password implementation with HMAC-SHA1, QR code generation, and authenticator integration in [ocaml/opam-repository#28704](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28704)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **OCaml 5.4 preview** preparation work by [Kate](https://github.com/kit-ty-kate) including ocamlformat support and marking preview packages unavailable in [ocaml/opam-repository#28716](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28716), [ocaml/opam-repository#28719](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28719), [ocaml/opam-repository#28733](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28733)

weekly_summary.cross_repository_work:
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ and __RUMINANT:tools__ **Merlin integration** of OxCaml compiler features with [Mark Shinwell](https://github.com/mshinwell) merging OxCaml 5.2.0minus-22 in [oxcaml/merlin#191](https://github.com/oxcaml/merlin/issues/191), bringing quotation support and layout polymorphism from [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) into Merlin editor tooling with 168 files changed (32,413 insertions, 24,515 deletions)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **OxCaml parametric libraries tooling support** coordinated across [ocaml/dune](https://github.com/ocaml/dune), [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin), [ocaml/ocaml-lsp](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp), and [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml) including Merlin config generation ([ocaml/dune#12550](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12550)), library instantiation ([ocaml/dune#12561](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12561)), and comprehensive tooling integration tracking ([ocaml/dune#12536](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12536))
- __RUMINANT:tools__ and __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Odoc-Dune integration** with multi-file support in [ocaml/odoc#1388](https://github.com/ocaml/odoc/issues/1388) driven by markdown integration needs in [ocaml/dune#12477](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12477)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ and __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **OCaml 5.4 release adoption** with CI updates in [ocaml/merlin](https://github.com/ocaml/merlin), ongoing testing in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2103](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2103), and reference manual updates in [ocaml/opam-repository#28722](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28722)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Windows platform support** improvements in [ocaml/ocamlfind#112](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/pull/112) addressing OCaml 5.0+ compatibility and [ocaml/opam#6592](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6592) with bootstrap dependency updates
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Editor tooling ecosystem** expanded with ocaml.nvim Neovim plugin announced on [ocaml/ocaml.org#3372](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3372), complementing coq-lsp 0.2.4+9.1 released in [ocaml/opam-repository#28534](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28534)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Formal verification ecosystem** visibility with Gospel status update blog post on [ocaml/ocaml.org#3352](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml.org/pull/3352) highlighting tooling available through [ocaml/opam-repository](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository), coinciding with Rocq releases ([ocaml/opam-repository#28706](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28706), [ocaml/opam-repository#28707](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28707)) and lambdapi 3.0.0 ([ocaml/opam-repository#28178](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28178))
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **js_of_ocaml patch management** in [oxcaml/opam-repository](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository) with [Patrick Ferris](https://github.com/patricoferris) addressing patch regressions in [oxcaml/opam-repository#20](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/20) and iarray compatibility issues in [oxcaml/opam-repository#19](https://github.com/oxcaml/opam-repository/issues/19)

weekly_summary.notable_discussions:
- __RUMINANT:core__ **One-liner comment syntax** proposal by [David Wong](https://github.com/mimoo) exploring the addition of single-line comment syntax to OCaml in [ocaml/ocaml#12066](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/12066)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Row-polymorphic tuples** debate in [ocaml/RFCs#57](https://github.com/ocaml/RFCs/pull/57) with [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) suggesting separation into a separate RFC and [Alistair](https://github.com/johnyob) clarifying that the current tuple projections RFC only discusses them as a future compatibility consideration
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Hashtbl seeded by default** proposal by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) to improve security and prevent DoS attacks in [ocaml/ocaml#14291](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14291)
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Labelled argument autocompletion design** extensive discussion in [ocaml/ocaml-lsp#1564](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml-lsp/issues/1564) with [Ulysse](https://github.com/voodoos) raising concerns about `:` trigger character scope, [Tom Ekander](https://github.com/lessp) demonstrating usefulness in large codebases, and proposals for configurable construct query behavior
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **Package lock directory placement** ongoing debate in [ocaml/dune#12097](https://github.com/ocaml/dune/issues/12097) about whether lock directories should default to `_build` versus worktree, balancing portability against repository noise
- __RUMINANT:tools__ **WebAssembly eval function behavior** discussion in [ocsigen/js_of_ocaml#2108](https://github.com/ocsigen/js_of_ocaml/issues/2108) between [@hhugo](https://github.com/hhugo) and [Jérôme Vouillon](https://github.com/vouillon) about ensuring runtime consistency between Wasm and JS backends
